name: Lyttle Tyke
description:
Submission for Yogscast Game Jam

A Reverse Stealth Game where Santa is trying to sneak into your home to deliver presents.
You are a Lyttle Tyke who wants to get his presents early because Santa never seems to
bring you what you want!

Grab your presents from Santa Xephos and take them to your room!
Use your toys as traps to stop Santa
Climb through vents and sprint to catch Santa

Controls:
Shift - Sprint
E - Interact/Grab & Drop Present/Toys
WASD - Movement
Q - Change Viewpoint to First Person

Play as Honeydew the Child!
